guide.introduction: Do you want to easily break a circuit?now you can follow these step to step instructions to make it good luck
guide.introduction_rendered:
Do you want to easily break a circuit?now you can follow these step to step instructions to make it good luck

Relevant parts
  • 30 foot electric cord, 1 regular switch, 1 metal switch plate, 8 wire nuts, 2 metal electrical boxes, one blank plate
Tools
  • screw drivers, wire stripers, utility knife, pliers
